name: Airpod
description: Experience unlimited musical freedom with AirPods! Instant connectivity, crystal-clear sound, and elegant design. Live the wireless experience that redefines the way you listen to music. AirPods: the effortless audio revolution.

details.details: Bluetooth 5.0 for fast and stable connection
Clear and immersive audio with noise-canceling technology
Ergonomic and discreet, fits perfectly in the ear
Up to 5 hours of continuous playback, with charging case
Intuitive touch for play, pause, and call handling
Compatible with iOS, Android, and other Bluetooth devices
Built-in sensors for automatic pause when removed from ears
Splash and sweat resistant, ideal for workouts
